entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pemberton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pemberton Airport 10:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
